chapter.title: Introduction
chapter.para: This is a plug-in which can be used to perform jmeter testing on a Geomajas server. The plugin consists of:

listitem.para: a server project that should be added as a jar to the Geomajas server web application (or at build time using maven dependency). This will install a Spring controller that exposes the command dispatcher through the Spring HTTP invoker protocol.

a client project that (along with some dependencies) should be installed in the JMETER_HOME/lib/ext folder. This will create an extra java sampler class org.geomajas.plugin.jmeter.GeomajasSamplerClient in the dropdown list of the Java Request Sampler configuration window. For usage of this sampler, see the configuration instructions of this plugin.

chapter.para: The plugin will allow to fetch a number of tiles from one or more layers of a Geomajas project. Tiles can be concurrently fetched with multiple threads in a thread group. Tiles can be optionally saved for verification. Tiles can be fetched using 2 run modes:

listitem.para: random mode: tiles are taken randomly from all scale levels of all allowed layers
topdown mode: tiles are taken from the top scale level (lowest scale) and going down to the lower levels (higher scales).

chapter.para: The top down mode can be used to seed one or more layers on the server.
